channel.title: Folded Wing... Tuned In To The Future
channel.description: Tuned In To The Future is a podcast blog about audio, music and broadcasting told from the perspective of award-wining production company Folded Wing and some of their friends.
channel.itunes:summary: Tuned In To The Future is a podcast blog about audio, music and broadcasting told from the perspective of award-wining production company Folded Wing and some of their friends.

image.title: Folded Wing... Tuned In To The Future

channel.itunes:author: Folded Wing

item.title: Episode 1 - Creating A Studio
item.itunes:author: Folded Wing
item.dc:creator: Folded Wing
item.description: Freshly installed in our new offices and studio in Clerkenwell, the first episode of Tuned Into The Future looks at the most important aspects of putting a studio together. Led by the man that built ours - Paul Miller from ASP - you will also hear some studio anecdotes from a few of the well known voices who have passed through it...
item.itunes:summary: Freshly installed in our new offices and studio in Clerkenwell, the first episode of Tuned Into The Future looks at the most important aspects of putting a studio together. Led by the man that built ours - Paul Miller from ASP - you will also hear some st
item.itunes:keywords: radio, media, branded, content, production, music, folded wing, karen p productions

item.title: Episode 2 - Backstage At Broadcasting
item.itunes:author: Folded Wing
item.dc:creator: Folded Wing
item.description: The second episode of Tuned In To The Future steps backstage at our Broad Casting collaboration night at London\'s Cargo. We hear from the team behind the scenes about the work that goes into recording and documenting a complicated and very exciting live event...
item.itunes:summary: The second episode of Tuned In To The Future steps backstage at our Broad Casting collaboration night at Londons Cargo. We hear from the team behind the scenes about the work that goes into recording and documenting a complicated and exciting live event.
item.itunes:keywords: folded wing, broadcasting, live events, radio, cargo, london

item.title: Episode 3 - Audio Perspectives
item.itunes:author: Folded Wing
item.dc:creator: Folded Wing
item.description: In this episode we are talking websites as Folded Wing launched our new website only a few months ago. We’ll be hearing about how that was put together, looking at new developments on the web and Oisin Lunny will be taking us on a tour around Habbo Hote
item.itunes:summary: In this episode we are talking websites as Folded Wing launched our new website only a few months ago. We’ll be hearing about how that was put together, looking at new developments on the web and Oisin Lunny will be taking us on a tour around Habbo Hote
item.itunes:keywords: audio developments, websites, oisin lunny, habbo hote

item.title: Episode 4 - Global Networks
item.itunes:author: Folded Wing
item.dc:creator: Folded Wing
item.description: This episode of Tuned In To The Future looks at some of the international friends and clients that Folded Wing have been working with over the last year or 2. We\'ve come into contact with some amazing people across the globe and in this instalment we focus in on J-Wave in Japan, Rhythm Lab in the USA and RBMA Radio in Germany. We also think about the advantages of building up contacts internationally.

item.itunes:keywords: folded wing, rbma, rhythm lab, j-wave, worldwide syndication

item.title: Episode 5 - On Location
item.itunes:author: Folded Wing
item.dc:creator: Folded Wing
item.description: In this month\'s episode of Tuned Into The Future, Maria Philips brings us a report from RBMA\'s Notting Hill Carnival event. We\'ll be getting a feel of the carnival vibe from the punters, seeing what goes into organising this kind of event and of course, hearing the some of the pumping beats brought to you by the Major Lazer Soundsystem.
item.itunes:summary: In this month\'s episode of Tuned Into The Future, Maria Philips brings us a report from RBMA\'s Notting Hill Carnival event. We\'ll be getting a feel of the carnival vibe from the punters, seeing what goes into organising this kind of event and of cour
item.itunes:keywords: Notting Hill Carnival, broadcasting, Red Bull Music Academy Radio, Major Lazer, live event

item.title: Episode 6 - Learning Through Broadcast
item.itunes:author: Folded Wing
item.dc:creator: Folded Wing
item.description: In this episode of Tuned Into The Future we are looking at the relationship between media and education. At the Folded Wing studios Karen P shares some hints and tips about editing music for radio. We hear from a producer at BBC Blast, who tells us what she loves about working in media Plus, we speak to media maestro Gail Gallie, who launched CBeebies and worked with Roundhouse Radio. Gail explains why it\'s so important for media companies to be involved in educating and tells us what they learn from the youngsters themselves.
item.itunes:summary: In this episode of Tuned Into The Future we are looking at the relationship between media and education. At the Folded Wing studios Karen P shares some hints and tips about editing music for radio. We hear from a producer at BBC Blast, who tells us wh
item.itunes:keywords: Gail Gallie, CBeebies, Roundhouse Radio, BBC Blast, media, education, learning, broadcasting

item.title: Episode 7 - Studio Snapshot
item.itunes:author: Folded Wing
item.dc:creator: Folded Wing
item.description: In this episode of Tuned Into The Future we will be going behind the scenes of the custom built Red Bull Music Academy radio studio, created by Folded Wing especially for it\'s London 2010 event. We find out the concept behind the studio, its capabilities and hear what gifted and celebrated musicians have graced its mic.
item.itunes:summary: In this episode of Tuned Into The Future we will be going behind the scenes of the custom built Red Bull Music Academy radio studio, created by Folded Wing especially for it\'s London 2010 event. We find out the concept behind the studio, its capabilities
item.itunes:keywords: red bull music academy radio, red bull music academy, karen p, folded wing, mickey curling, xanthe fuller, yannick elverfeld, teri gender bender, juan son

item.title: Episode 10 - Worldwide syndication with the British Council - The Selector
item.itunes:author: Folded Wing
item.dc:creator: Folded Wing
item.description: In this episode of Tuned Into The Future we find out about the British Council, take a trip to Kazakhstan and shout about UK music. All on the Selector radio show, which we produce for the British Council.
item.itunes:summary: In this episode of Tuned Into The Future we find out about the British Council, take a trip to Kazakhstan and shout about UK music. All on the Selector radio show, which we produce for the British Council.
item.itunes:keywords: radio, media, branded, content, production, music, folded wing, karen p productions, the selector, british council, syndication, UK music

item.title: Episode 11 - Making A Radio Documentary
item.itunes:author: Folded Wing
item.dc:creator: Folded Wing
item.description: For this episode of Tuned Into The Future we delve into the process of making a radio documentary; from the initial inspiration through to the research, interviewing, mixing and completion.
item.itunes:summary: For this episode of Tuned Into The Future we delve into the process of making a radio documentary; from the initial inspiration through to the research, interviewing, mixing and completion.
item.itunes:keywords: documentaries, bbc, radio 1, 1xtra, radio 2, folded wing, simon barnard, piers bradford

item.title: Episode 12 - How To Get Radio Play
item.itunes:author: Folded Wing
item.dc:creator: Folded Wing
item.description: In this episode of Tuned In To The Future we look at how and why we pick the music that features in our programmes and offer our thoughts on how best to get your music heard on the radio. As well as Karen Pearson and John Cranmer from Folded Wing, we hear from Emma Warren, presenter of \'Pick n Mix Live\' from the Red Bull Studio\' on NME Radio, Goldierocks, presenter of the British Council\'s radio show The Selector, Chris Young from music promotions company Nurture Music and singer Zara McFarlane from Brownswood Recordings.
item.itunes:keywords: folded wing, radio play, zara mcfarlane, karen p, chris young, pluggers, nurture music

item.title: Episode 13 - Routes In To Radio
item.itunes:author: Folded Wing
item.dc:creator: Folded Wing
item.description:
In this episode of Tuned In To The Future, Joe Greig - who is completing a work placement at Folded Wing - explores the Routes In To Radio.
We hear from radio production lecturer Matthew Linfoot from Westminster University; John Myers, chief executive of the Radio Academy, Carina Tillson from Global Radio, Natasha Maw from the BBC Academy, Fred Bradley from the Student Radio Association and more.
This episode was made in conjunction with the Radio Academy's Foot In The Door event at the Radio Festival, 2011.
item.itunes:summary:
